reasoning: Dilated cardiomyopathy incidence ~6 per 100k person-years, prevalence ~36 per 100k (1 in 2,500). Reporting both metrics as DCM has well-documented incidence and prevalence data.
source: Codd MB et al. (1989). Epidemiology of idiopathic dilated and hypertrophic cardiomyopathy. Circulation. 80(3):564-72
